name: BEAN BEING
description:
48Hour Game Jam - We didn't want to go outside to attend Global Game Jam, so here's our compromise, made at home for fun.

Credits

Samson Starmer-Lee (@itisSamson) - Code and Design

Ashleigh Starmer-Lee (@catshriek) - Art

Audio 

Character Voice by lemonjolly

"Hit_Hurt7.wav" by n_audioman

"Pop, Low, A (H1).wav" by InspectorJ

"HandClap.wav" by mikaelfernstrom

"Psychedelic" by BenSound

Please note... to play again you will need to close and re-open the game.
